item.description:
Mark your calendars!

We have Brian Chick coming June 16th to show off the wonders of Adobe Premiere Pro.  Brian is an instructional technologist at Great Bay Community College and an established videographer with experience in commercial and documentaries.

The presentation will include things from the very basics, such as importing assets and setting up the workspace, to adding in special effects completely inside of PP.  This will be a great opportunity for beginners and intermediates and wannabe video producers.

Please join the group in welcoming Brian and picking his brain.
item.how_to_find_us: Enter through the main doors at Manchester Community College, turn right and the room is directly on the right
item.name: June Manchester Adobe User Group
